titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation concerning gold-weights.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie: and by the assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Whitehall the twentieth day of December, in the eighth yeere of Our Reigne ...
Arms 21 (with C R at the top); Steele notation: of made 2) haue auoide.
Requiring use of new official weights and balances after 26. Jan.--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
